quizzes.name: Find the Music Note
quizzes.description: Test your ability to identify notes in different keys and clefs.

quizzes.name: Historical Harmonies
quizzes.description: Dive into music history and discover its great composers.

quizzes.description: Sharpen your knowledge of major and minor key signatures.

quizzes.name: Composer Match
quizzes.description: Match the composer to their famous works.

quizzes.name: Historical Eras
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of musical time periods.

quizzes.name: Instruments Through Time
quizzes.description: Learn about the evolution of musical instruments.

quizzes.name: Identify the Instrument
quizzes.description: Guess the instrument from its sound or image.

quizzes.name: Instrument Families
quizzes.description: Classify instruments into their respective families.

quizzes.name: Unusual Instruments
quizzes.description: Learn about rare and unique instruments.
